page.title: 03Buildings in East Herrington
page.content:
East Herrington{branch library}has over 3500 books, both in the building and in a mobile library which travels around the area. The library is open five days a week, and the busiest time is on a Monday between 2pm and 5pm. There are storytime sessions for young children every Tuesday at 2.30pm. The most popular books are those by Catherine Cookson.
In 1984 a{sheltered home}was built for old people. It is a two storey building containing thirty flats. Another complex for old people is presently (1985) being built next to it.
